commandsText.start: Welcome to the murder mystery value updates bot! It will send any updates in values in a span of minutes! To get updated every time a change happens type /subscribe command
commandsText.subscribe: You were successfully added to list of subscribers. To unsubscribe simply type /unsubscribe
commandsText.unsubscribe: You were successfully removed from list of subscribers
commandsText.help:
How to use all inventory commands?
Syntax: <item-name> <quantity>, <item-name> <quantity>
You may use semicolon (;) instead of "," to divide items
If you don't set quantity 1 will be set by default
Example: candleflame; evergun 2
When two items have the same name you need to specify type and origin like this
Example: makeshift:godlies 2; aurora (gun):rares 3

Short description of all the commands:

/start - introduction to bot

/subscribe - subscribe to the updates

/unsubscribe - unsubscribe from the updates

/log - get the last update

/status - check if you are subscribed

/help - check every command's description

/info - get information about an item
Example: /info evergreen

/find - look for item(s) with a certain name (max items in response - 10)
Example: /find aurora
You don't need to specify (gun) or (knife), it will return both and more that matches pattern aurora

/calc - calculate total value and give short info of items given

/inventory - show all items and total value of your inventory

/value - shows total value of your inventory

/profit - shows your value of your inventory before the value change and after

/add - add items to your inventory
Example: /add evergreen

/remove - remove items from your inventory
Example: /remove iceblaster 2; icebreaker

/clear - removes all items from inventory
